0.text: Innate: Jarvan IV's basic attacks are empowered to deal additional physical damage equal to 8% of the target's current health, with a minimum threshold of 20 and capped at 400 against all targets.
0.html: Innate: Jarvan IV's basic attacks are empowered to deal additional physical damage equal to 8% of the target's current health, with a minimum threshold of 20 and capped at 400 against all targets.

1.text: This effect cannot occur on the same target more than once every few seconds.
1.html: This effect cannot occur on the same target more than once every few seconds.

0.text: Active: Jarvan IV extends his lance in the target direction, dealing physical damage to enemies hit and inflicting them with  armor reduction for 3 seconds.
0.html: Active: Jarvan IV extends his lance in the target direction, dealing physical damage to enemies hit and inflicting them with  armor reduction for 3 seconds.
markedPassages: armor reduction

1.text: If the lance connects with a deployed  Demacian Standard, Jarvan IV  dashes to its location,  knocking up nearby enemies around him and along his path for 0.75 seconds.
1.html: If the lance connects with a deployed Demacian Standard, Jarvan IV dashes to its location, knocking up nearby enemies around him and along his path for 0.75 seconds.
markedPassages: Demacian Standard
dashes
knocking up

2.text: Jarvan IV can cast any of his abilities during the dash.
2.html: Jarvan IV can cast any of his abilities during the dash.
possibleConcerningAbilities: Jarvan IV can cast any of his abilities during the dash.

0.text: Active: Jarvan IV  slows all nearby enemies for 2 seconds.
0.html: Active: Jarvan IV slows all nearby enemies for 2 seconds.
markedPassages: slows

1.text: Jarvan IV also grants himself a  shield for 4 seconds, increased by 1.3% of his maximum health for each enemy  champion hit by Golden Aegis.
1.html: Jarvan IV also grants himself a shield for 4 seconds, increased by 1.3% of his maximum health for each enemy champion hit by Golden Aegis.
markedPassages: shield
champion

0.text: Passive: Jarvan IV gains  bonus attack speed.
0.html: Passive: Jarvan IV gains  bonus attack speed.
markedPassages: bonus attack speed

1.text: Active: Jarvan IV throws a Demacian flag to the target location, dealing magic damage to enemies within the area.
1.html: Active: Jarvan IV throws a Demacian flag to the target location, dealing magic damage to enemies within the area.

2.text: The flag then remains for 8 seconds, granting  sight of its surroundings and providing an aura that grants bonus attack speed equal to Demacian Standard's passive to Jarvan IV and all nearby allied champions.
2.html: The flag then remains for 8 seconds, granting sight of its surroundings and providing an aura that grants bonus attack speed equal to Demacian Standard's passive to Jarvan IV and all nearby allied champions.
markedPassages: sight

3.text: Demacian Standard will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
3.html: Demacian Standard will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
possibleConcerningAbilities: Demacian Standard will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

0.text: Active: Jarvan IV  leaps with  displacement immunity to the target enemy champion's location over 0.35 seconds, dealing physical damage to all nearby enemies upon arrival.
0.html: Active: Jarvan IV leaps with displacement immunity to the target enemy champion's location over 0.35 seconds, dealing physical damage to all nearby enemies upon arrival.
markedPassages: leaps
displacement immunity

1.text: Upon impact, he creates a circle of impassable terrain that initially pulls units inside it, though not rendering them  airborne. The terrain lasts for 3.5 seconds and grants  sight of the area. Cataclysm can be recast after 1 second while the terrain is active.
1.html: Upon impact, he creates a circle of impassable terrain that initially pulls units inside it, though not rendering them airborne. The terrain lasts for 3.5 seconds and grants sight of the area. Cataclysm can be recast after 1 second while the terrain is active.
markedPassages: airborne
sight

2.text: Recast: Jarvan IV destroys the terrain created by Cataclysm.
2.html: Recast: Jarvan IV destroys the terrain created by Cataclysm.
